SEARCH
Package au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.comparison

Interface ColumnEquality

All Known Subinterfaces:
ColumnComparator, ElementWiseEquality
All Known Implementing Classes:
ArrayElementWiseColumnEquality, CodingEquality, DecimalComparator, DefaultComparator, QuantityComparator, TemporalComparator
public interface ColumnEquality
An interface that defines methods for comparing two Column objects for equality and inequality.
Author:
Piotr Szul

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default ColumnEquality
    asArrayComparator()
    Returns a comparator that can be used to compare arrays of the elements that this comparator can compare.
    Column
    equalsTo(Column left, Column right)
    Creates an element equality comparison between two columns.
    default Column
    notEqual(Column left, Column right)
    Creates an element inequality comparison between two columns.

  • Method Details

    • equalsTo

      @Nonnull Column equalsTo(@Nonnull Column left, @Nonnull Column right)
      Creates an element equality comparison between two columns.
      Parameters:
      left - the left column
      right - the right column
      Returns:
      a column representing the equality comparison

    • notEqual

      @Nonnull default Column notEqual(@Nonnull Column left, @Nonnull Column right)
      Creates an element inequality comparison between two columns.
      Parameters:
      left - the left column
      right - the right column
      Returns:
      a column representing the inequality comparison

    • asArrayComparator

      @Nonnull default ColumnEquality asArrayComparator()
      Returns a comparator that can be used to compare arrays of the elements that this comparator can compare.
      Returns:
      a comparator for arrays of comparable elements
